channel.title: Jagex Player Mod
channel.description:
Well i just got offered a Player Mod spot, since i havent had an offence since 2007 and im always reporting bots (Curse them)
Would it be against mscp rules if i accepted it? And to make it a discussion, has anyone ever wanted to/been offered to be a Player Mod?

item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Yea it was already proven he wasn’t telling the truth, so I’ll just lock this.

Read full topic

item.title: Jagex Player Mod
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

rip4d:

Andrew… times have changed. Its been 5 years, so maybe the answers given in those Q&As could be out dated

I stated the 06 thing because I was there in person, if you look up old Q A session on the forums on RuneScape you can find they say the same thing year after year up to the current one.

Read full topic

item.title: Jagex Player Mod
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:

Andrew… times have changed. Its been 5 years, so maybe the answers given in those Q&As could be out dated

item.title: Jagex Player Mod
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

rip4d:

Or it could be 5 years in the future and you could be completely wrong, considering there’s been a new head honcho at Jagex since 09 or something.

Most player mods know no more then regular players, they don’t get magic information from Jagex other then bot spotting methods. They don’t get updates in advance, how Jagex operates, when they need moderators or stuff like that. One of the things they CAN do is if a player moderator knows a worthy candidate he can suggest it and it will be considered (very small consideration) when they need moderators. No information has been released to anyone other then the Q and A events and in every single one Jagex states that Player mods are chosen based on a few per world they release. Also casey, I know your a troll and all but coming to extreme defense over a simple discussion really makes you look like the true moron, calm down its suppose to be enjoyable to communicate.

Read full topic

item.title: Jagex Player Mod
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“casey., post:77, topic:407265”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=508549.msg3692145#msg3692145 date=1312189597]
Well although I’m not going to sit here and argue Ill just point this out. Jagex sends out applications for player mods whenever a new world opens, they make it so they have 2-4 player mods for each world they have. Your player mod friends don’t know the whole thing.

Source: J-Mod Q-A section back in 06 on world 2.
Edited: Fergot the W in whole, little sleepy.
[/quote]
This is not 2006 you fucking moron[/quote]
Someones cranky cause they know I’m right.

Read full topic

item.title: Jagex Player Mod
item.dc:creator: @B2300_T4nk B2300 T4nk
item.description:
@B2300_T4nk wrote:

[quote=“Foxdie, post:2, topic:407433”][quote author=B2300 T4nk link=topic=508549.msg3692159#msg3692159 date=1312191680]

[quote author=TabbyKiller link=topic=508549.msg3692149#msg3692149 date=1312190286]

Thread is complete BS.

  1. Jagex is not Hiring player mods currently.
  2. Jagex isn’t allowed to higher a Canadian mod currently. They are limited to England for now.

I have multiple mods in my clan. Nice try at attention though.

Well although I’m not going to sit here and argue Ill just point this out. Jagex sends out applications for player mods whenever a new world opens, they make it so they have 2-4 player mods for each world they have. Your player mod friends don’t know the whole thing.

Source: J-Mod Q-A section back in 06 on world 2.

hehe gotcha there ^
[/quote]hehe gotcha there ^
[/quote]a certain egyptian needs to come irc now[/quote]I know who you are

Read full topic
